Action Sheet

Action sheets can be triggered in your app view to providing contextual actions on a component. They act as slide up menus on small devices and drop downs on larger screens.

Tap to share

  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • Mail

Basic HTML

You can create an actionsheet with this basic directive.

````html

Tap to share

  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • Mail
````

Tap to share

Additional Options

To use a custom buttom, ammend the `zf-as-button` declaration with your custom HTML like so:

````html toggle my button goes here My content goes here ````

Sass Variables

You can customize with [Item] with these variables in _settings.scss:

````html $actionsheet-background: white !default; $actionsheet-border-color: #ccc !default; $actionsheet-animate: transform opacity !default; $actionsheet-animation-speed: 0.25s !default; $actionsheet-width: 300px !default; $actionsheet-radius: 4px !default; $actionsheet-shadow: 0 -3px 10px rgba(black, 0.25) !default; $actionsheet-padding: $global-padding !default; $actionsheet-tail-size: 10px !default; $actionsheet-popup-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(black, 0.25) !default; $actionsheet-link-color: #000 !default; $actionsheet-link-background-hover: smartscale($actionsheet-background) !default; ````
